problem.markdown:
Finding all subsets: What's the worst-case running time as a function of the size of N? ( ) Constant ( ) Logarithmic ( ) Linear ( ) Quadratic (x) Exponential
[explanation] There are an exponential number of subsets of a list N of people of size n. It doesn't matter what algorithm you choose, because you've got to generate this exponential-sized return value, so the problem is exponential in nature. [explanation]
problem.p: Finding all subsets: What's the worst-case running time as a function of the size of N?

div.p: There are an exponential number of subsets of a list N of people of size n. It doesn't matter what algorithm you choose, because you've got to generate this exponential-sized return value, so the problem is exponential in nature.
